channel.title: Injury Updates on BalleWale Cricket News
channel.description: Recent content in Injury Updates on BalleWale Cricket News

item.title: Ellis Backs Australia's Pace Depth to Cover Big-Name Absences Ahead of World Cup
item.description: Australia's pace bowling depth is set to shine as Ellis emphasizes readiness to fill gaps left by injured stars in the World Cup.

item.title: Injury-hit New Zealand Eye Revenge as Afghanistan Look to Run It Back
item.description: New Zealand faces Afghanistan in a crucial World Cup clash, seeking redemption after previous encounters amidst injury challenges.
